description:
Koga travels next to recruit Haruto against the rising Pallasites.  But the Wolf Haurto life has turned an unexpected direction and he is not quick to give it up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokoro ni Hibike! Haruto no Shout!
Resonate in the Heart! Haruto`s Shout!
心に響け! 栄斗のシャウト!
